description:
Nature-themed backgrounds have been added to the Fitness Boxing 2: Rhythm & Exercise game!* Try them out when Stage Animation is set to "Light."

Jab and cross in 3 added backgrounds** inspired by the great outdoors! 

Float above a peaceful lake reflecting the sky in "Lagoon." Take in the trees in "Forest"â€”you can almost feel the fresh air. Enter a pristine, white snowscape in "Snowfield."

The backdrop of nature can be your virtual gym as you exercise (and relax) with these added backgrounds.
name: Fitness Boxing 2: Nature Stages
